name: 风景谜题三合一 Scenery Puzzle 3in1
name_original: 风景谜题三合一 Scenery Puzzle 3in1
description:
You can open your own picture to play Jigsaw in this game. Jigsaw Freedom

Scenery Puzzle 3 in 1 has over 1300 scenery pictures. This puzzle game is made by one person, individual game producer Mr.Serious, and has three game modes and unlimit the time to solve the puzzles.

The first is Jigsaw mode. The selectable difficulty ranges are from 4x4 to 12x12. You can open local picture to jigsaw or just go to next picture provided.

The second is Find the differences mode, it has over 1000 puzzles. You have three times to click out the difference. If not, go to the next puzzle automatic. You can also click the double arrow icon to go to next puzzle.

The third is Sliding tiles puzzle mode is a historical game. You move the gap grid and exchange the place with the next grid and finally complete the picture in the right, and you can aslo open local picture to play.
developers: 独立游戏制作人严肃思考
publishers: 独立游戏制作人严肃思考
